sentences.en: A truck plowed into my car and smashed the fender.
sentences.cn: 一辆卡车撞上了我的车把保险杠撞坏了.

sentences.en: Fender - bender . In the distant future, Earth could collide with another planet.
sentences.cn: 在遥远的将来, 地球可能与其他行星相撞.

sentences.en: Fender - benders are unavoidable in Taipei, even when your car is parked.
sentences.cn: 在台北, 即使车子停靠在路边,小小擦撞依然不可避免.

sentences.en: Fender's bass was a huge success, and its design became his signature.
sentences.cn: 芬达的贝斯取得了巨大的成功, 其设计也成了芬达的招牌.

sentences.en: He settled deeper into the arm - chair and put his feet up on the fender.
sentences.cn: 他在沙发上再躺下一些,把脚搁在壁炉挡架上.

sentences.en: He was abreast of the limousine. He tapped its fender with his nightstick.
sentences.cn: 他停住脚步,用短棒把轿车的挡泥板敲了几下.

sentences.en: Herbert got into a fender bender while he was running.
sentences.cn: 赫伯特跑步的时候,出了一点轻微事故.

sentences.en: I got a ding in my rear fender.
sentences.cn: 我汽车后面的挡泥板撞瘪了一处。

sentences.en: If equipped, remove the radio antenna mast, and components from the fender.
sentences.cn: 如果装备了无线电天线罩和零件,从挡泥板拆下它们.

sentences.en: In Britain they call a fender a wing.
Install the bolts attaching the end cap to the front fender.
sentences.cn: 安装连接末端端盖到前挡泥板的螺栓.

sentences.en: Kids inspired by Jimi Hendrix, Jeff Beck and Eric Clapton turned to Fender.
sentences.cn: 从JimiHendrix, JeffBeck和EricClapton的音乐中得到灵感的小子们开始转向购买fender吉他.

sentences.en: Lower part rear bumper the design has the black fender, artistic practical.
sentences.cn: 后保险杠下部设计有黑色的保护板, 美观实用.

sentences.en: Remove the fender top, front and the rear screws.
sentences.cn: 拆下挡泥板顶部 、 前部和后部螺丝.

sentences.en: Route sensor wire from steering knuckle to fender panel.
sentences.cn: 从转向节到防护板安排感知器导线走向.

sentences.en: Todd sat on the front fender, his legs dangling toward the ground.
sentences.cn: 托德坐在前挡泥板上，双腿耷拉晃荡着。

words.tran_cn: （汽车等的）[建][车辆]挡泥板；防卫物；（暖炉的）炉围；（船只的）[船]碰垫

phrases.tran_cn: 轻微交通事故；撞弯保险杠的车祸（等于小车祸）
橡皮挡泥板；橡胶防冲垫；橡胶护垫

trans.tran_cn: （车辆的）挡泥板，防御物，火炉围栏，保险杠
trans.tran_en: the side part of a car that covers the wheels
